Html:
Would it be possible for your (otherwise very helpful) tool to support code generation from JSON Schema and/or Orderly?

NB: I know JSON.NET supports schema generation (http://sixgun.wordpress.com/2012/02/09/using-json-net-to-generate-jsonschema/) and json validation (http://james.newtonking.com/json/help/index.html?topic=html/JsonSchema.htm)
